data.eml:eml: A new species of Lygodactylus (Squamata: Gekkonidae) endemic to Mount Namuli, an isolated ‘ sky island’ of northern Mozambique

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Portik, Daniel M., Travers, Scott L., Bauer, Aaron M., Branch, William R. (2013): A new species of Lygodactylus (Squamata: Gekkonidae) endemic to Mount Namuli, an isolated ‘ sky island’ of northern Mozambique. Zootaxa 3710 (5): 415-435, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.5.2
